name: opencodium
description: A collection of miscellaneous OpenCode plugins. Worktrees, commit automation, external directory symlinks, and more.

scripts.build:bundles: bun run build:bundles:shared && bun run build:bundles:plugins
scripts.build:bundles:plugins: for plugin in auto-worktree bash-wrapper dyn-sym git-narration nix-develop; do echo "Building $plugin..." && bun build ./packages/$plugin/src/index.ts --outfile ./packages/$plugin/dist/$plugin.bundle.js --target node --minify --external @opencode-ai/plugin --external bun && echo "âœ“ Created packages/$plugin/dist/$plugin.bundle.js"; done
scripts.publish:all: bun run build && bun run publish:packages
scripts.publish:packages: for pkg in packages/*; do (cd $pkg && npm publish --access public); done
